title: Senior MLOps Engineer
summary: Highly skilled and results-oriented Senior MLOps Engineer with over 7 years of experience designing, building, and maintaining scalable machine learning pipelines and infrastructure. Proven ability to bridge the gap between Data Science and Operations, implementing robust CI/CD, monitoring, and deployment strategies for ML models in production environments across various cloud platforms. Adept at optimizing model performance, ensuring reliability, and driving innovation in MLOps practices.

description: Led the design and implementation of an end-to-end MLOps platform leveraging Kubernetes, MLflow, and Kubeflow, reducing model deployment time by 40% and increasing reliability.
Developed automated CI/CD pipelines for ML model training, evaluation, and deployment using GitLab CI and Argo CD, ensuring seamless transitions from development to production.
Managed and optimized cloud infrastructure (AWS EKS, GCP GKE) for scalable ML workloads, handling data processing, model serving, and online inference at high traffic volumes.
Implemented comprehensive monitoring and alerting systems with Prometheus and Grafana for model performance, data drift, and infrastructure health in production.
Collaborated closely with data scientists to containerize models, standardize development environments, and enforce best practices for reproducible ML experiments.
Built and maintained production-grade data pipelines for machine learning models using Apache Airflow and Spark, processing terabytes of data daily.
Deployed and managed Flask/FastAPI microservices for model inference APIs on AWS EC2 and Lambda, ensuring high availability and low latency.
Instrumented logging and tracing for ML services, contributing to faster debugging and improved system stability.
Developed custom tools and scripts in Python and Bash to automate various MLOps tasks, including dataset versioning and model retraining triggers.
Provided operational support for data science teams, assisting in the deployment and scaling of predictive analytics models.
Developed and maintained backend services for internal AI applications using Python and Django REST Framework.
Integrated initial machine learning models into production backend systems, focusing on data serialization and API design.
Assisted in setting up initial CI/CD processes for backend applications using Jenkins.
Wrote comprehensive unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and system reliability.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
